mapper.select: SELECT SUM(p.amount) AS total_amount, b.book_title, b.genre, b.adult, i.`path`, b.book_num FROM book b INNER JOIN image i ON b.book_num = i.book_num INNER JOIN purchase p ON p.book_num = b.book_num GROUP BY b.book_num, b.book_title, b.genre, b.adult, i.`path` ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 4;
